titleStmt.title: Quakers mere obbists, or, A Letter to a preaching Quaker from a moderate gentleman trepan'd into one of their meetings, in hopes to work him to the party : wherein a true and short account is given of their foolish and ridiculous way of worship : written some time since, and to gratifie the importunities of several and remove the many and great errors occasion'd by often transcriptions, now printed by a correct copy.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
